body_html:
Ok i followed your guide here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile

Skipped building protobuf since i already built protobuf in my earlier attempt.
protoc --version
libprotoc 3.0.0

After running
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile
i got,
gcc: error: unrecognized option ‘--std=c++11’

So i updated gcc to 4.7.2 (gcc version 4.7.2 (Debian 4.7.2-5))
and i got,
./tensorflow/core/lib/gtl/inlined_vector.h:383:10: error: ‘is_trivially_destructible’ is not a member of ‘std’

so i changed ‘is_trivially_destructible’ to 'has_trivial_destructor' and now i'm getting
./tensorflow/core/lib/gtl/array_slice_internal.h:232:38: error: ‘tensorflow::gtl::array_slice_internal::ArraySliceImplBase::ArraySliceImplBase’ names constructor

I'm obviously trying to build with the wrong gcc version or something. help!
body_text:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile
Skipped building protobuf since i already built protobuf in my earlier attempt.

After running

So i updated gcc to 4.7.2 (gcc version 4.7.2 (Debian 4.7.2-5))
and i got,
./tensorflow/core/lib/gtl/inlined_vector.h:383:10: error: ‘is_trivially_destructible’ is not a member of ‘std’
so i changed ‘is_trivially_destructible’ to 'has_trivial_destructor' and now i'm getting
./tensorflow/core/lib/gtl/array_slice_internal.h:232:38: error: ‘tensorflow::gtl::array_slice_internal::ArraySliceImplBase::ArraySliceImplBase’ names constructor
I'm obviously trying to build with the wrong gcc version or something. help!
body:
Ok i followed your guide here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile

Skipped building protobuf since i already built protobuf in my earlier attempt.
protoc --version
libprotoc 3.0.0

After running
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile
i got,
gcc: error: unrecognized option ‘--std=c++11’

So i updated gcc to 4.7.2 (gcc version 4.7.2 (Debian 4.7.2-5))
and i got,
./tensorflow/core/lib/gtl/inlined_vector.h:383:10: error: ‘is_trivially_destructible’ is not a member of ‘std’

so i changed ‘is_trivially_destructible’ to 'has_trivial_destructor' and now i'm getting
./tensorflow/core/lib/gtl/array_slice_internal.h:232:38: error: ‘tensorflow::gtl::array_slice_internal::ArraySliceImplBase<const T>::ArraySliceImplBase’ names constructor

I'm obviously trying to build with the wrong gcc version or something. help!
